item.description:
The Ira is Hosting a Most Wonderful Evening.


A NEW AND EXCITING CONCEPT IN THE SINGLES WORLD: A new monthly singles event that promises to have a different theme each month, and be

FUN, ORGINAL, CREATIVE, AND BEST ALL, AN OPPORTUNITY TO

FIND A KEEPER!!!!!


You guessed it: The name of Event Series is: FIND A KEEPER ( Maybe, no more need to search hours and hours the internet for that Keeper Person, just maybe)


Find a Keeper is a singles night for grownups – 40 and over --co-hosted by The Ira-

of the always-fun and welcoming The Ira’s Single Events. Yes, branching out into Western Massachusetts. A chance to meet and mingle with your next door Massachusetts Singles neighbor….( Yea- for expanding your horizons!!)


Join us to eat, drink, mingle and meet new people – maybe find the person you’ve been looking for. At the very least, you’ll have a great time in a warm, and inviting atmosphere -- all with The Ira’s own brand of personal introductions for all.



THE EXCITING DETAILS BELOW:


WHEN: Friday. March 12, 2010. 6:00 p.m.- whenever


WHERE: Delaney House, 1 Country Club Road, Holyoke, MA 01040. 413-532-1800 ( I can hear you now- OMG- it is so far… That is why you have a car and a GPS System, plus a friend or two to car pool with. Don’t stay at home and complain, do join)



For only $25, you ask? What does this cover?



Wine Tasting

Live Piano Music ( as opposed to recorded music!!!!!!)

Concept food stations ( This means more than one food station) which includes:


Incredible Appetizers


Delicious Entrees


Fabulous Desserts


Plus- Bartenders to prepare your favorite cocktails, if you are not a wine connoisseur. ( Cash Bar)


For tickets, call 413-535-5077 or visit: http://www.logcabin-d...

Please also send me an email once your ticket has been purchased: mistrchrming@aol.com.
item.how_to_find_us: The Ira's Greeting Table and Large Easy To Read Sign.
item.name: The Ira- Find a Keeper Singles Event. Lot's of Fun and Different
